code: import{SHOW_CART}from'../constants/actionTypes';var initShowState={show:false};var showcart=function showcart(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initShowState.show;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case SHOW_CART:return!action.showcart;default:return state;}};export default showcart;
